article.headline: 3M Co. stock rises Thursday, still underperforms market
article.body: Shares of 3M Co. MMM, +0.94% inched 0.73% higher to $167.71 Thursday, on what proved to be an all-around positive trading session for the stock market, with the S&P 500 Index SPX, +0.87% rising 0.80% to 3,446.83 and the Dow Jones Industrial Average DJIA, +0.56% rising 0.43% to 28,425.51. This was the stock's second consecutive day of gains. 3M Co. closed $14.84 short of its 52-week high ($182.54), which the company reached on January 14th. The stock outperformed some of its competitors Thursday, as Amazon.com Inc. AMZN, +3.01% fell 0.16% to $3,190.55, Johnson & Johnson JNJ, +1.39% rose 0.68% to $148.89, and Danaher Corp. DHR, +2.42% fell 0.59% to $220.71. Trading volume (1.8 M) remained 647,497 below its 50-day average volume of 2.4 M.
